name: Snow Flower
description:
Snow Flower is a simple puzzle game, made for "Fuck this Jam" 2014.

The goal is to replay the given sequence in order to win the level.

Currently there are 8 levels with increasing difficulty.

Please enjoy Snow Flower!

Knowing bugs:

  • After failing a level, the refresh button takes a while to reload the level

If you have feedback or just want to say "hi", you can get in touch with me on twitter @zun1x.

P.S I would like to thank Mazzin for the music part and all playtester in this week that played Snow Flower!
